abstract: The 10th-annual Most Powerful Women in Banking gala focused less on the leadership change atop Citigroup than on the state of women in the financial industry.
snippet: The 10th-annual Most Powerful Women in Banking gala focused less on the leadership change atop Citigroup than on the state of women in the financial industry.
lead_paragraph: Michael L. Corbat had been invited to spend Tuesday evening at the Waldorf-Astoria in Manhattan for an awards dinner celebrating women in banking.

headline.main: At a Banking Gala, Chatter Is About Citi’s New C.E.O.
